comment._content: Hot enough to give the horse a shower, yet the man is still in long sleeves...  People lived at a different standard then.  How could so much change so fast.

comment.author: 91263176@N00
comment._content: That's nothing, the women of the day wore long dresses, petticoats and hats. Their kids often wore WHITE dresses and formal clothing, and the laundry was done by hand, laughable how today with modern washing machines people complain about laundry duty of washing a few blue jeans and tee shirts!
